meta_home_title: Spiritus | Save memories of your loved ones, forever!
meta_home_description: Discover stories from ordinary and extraordinary people and get inspired.

project_vukovar_subtitle: Every human life is so much more than just names and dates. Eternally Grateful is a project in which we are trying to collect and preserve memories of victims of Homeland War. If you knew our heroes, become their memory Guardian. By posting photos, anecdotes and life stories help us save the memory of them, forever.
menu_funeral_notices_subtitle: See who has passed away recently.
menu_funeral_notices_desc: View latest funeral notices and obituaries.
